snippet.title: The Concierge Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Gameplay trailer for my short point and click mystery horror, "The Concierge"

Brought to Hope Springs by a new job, Daniel Price has no idea what secrets the Hope Springs Hotel holds. At least, not yet.

►Get the Game : http://gamejolt.com/games/TheConcierge/259963

►Twitter : https://twitter.com/Dansodic

►Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/dankennygamedesign/

►Instagram: https://instagram.com/dansodic/

► Web: http://www.dankennygamedesign.com/
